name: TypeScript
description: I have worked with TypeScript/JavaScript extensively for about 1 year, and I am confident of writing both frontend and backend code with TS. I am also familiar with concepts like arrow functions, prop spreading, and have worked with ESLint to produce consistent code.

name: React
description: I have worked with React extensively for about 1 year, and I have plenty of experience with React hooks, the designing of components, and the various characteristics of single-page applications.

name: CI/CD Setup
description: I am very familiar with setting up CI/CD workflows especially on GitHub, having integrated several actions into various repositories before to automate code testing, progress tracking, error catching, notifications and deployment.

name: Cloud Native Development
description: I have studied various concepts relating to Cloud Native Development, such as containers, microservices and REST APIs, CI/CD and DevOps. I have also had practical working experience with the containerization tool Docker to deploy applications.

name: Python
description: I have used Python on and off for about 5 years for a myriad of purposes, from data analytics, to machine learning, to competitive programming. I am very comfortable using Python as an all-purpose language to solve problems, but I'm not too experienced doing object-oriented programming with it.

name: Go
description: I have used Go to create microservices and web application backend before, using libraries like Mux to handle API requests, and also using channels to handle several real-time goroutines.
